name: care&control v2.00[alpha]
description:
The world has decayed in your absence, and as the caretaker of this world it is your job to cultivate the StarFlowers and bathe their seeds in the abysmal trenches left in your once glorious world.

HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED

care&control v2.00 can be played fast or slow. Enjoy the experience how you feel comfortable

[ MAC OS 10.10 YOSEMITE ISSUES, GAME MAY NOT OPEN ]

Current Version
Does not have the flashing background colours, they have been fixed. This was an issue in the past, going to keep it up here in case it shows up again.

CONTENT WARNING: This is very early and a bit buggy, SEIZURE WARNING for flashing colours in the background. Also the transitions around the edges of the world are rough.

Support the development of more abstract underground games!

EARLY ACCESS - CONTROLLER NECESSARY

[ how to play:

GamePad: Left analog stick for movement - L trigger to grow flowers - R trigger to cultivate seeds. pick up seeds on collision, drop off on abyss on collision

Keyboard: WASD for movement - K to grow flowers - L to get seeds from flowers.]

ESC KEY TO EXIT GAME

v200 Update1 added:

  • replaced all gamejam build assets
  • fixed troubling possibly seizure inducing rendering glitch
  • tightened gamepad controls
  • added keyboard control options [ very snake-like, different feel ]
  • updated camera following to work tighter
  • added better border transitions
  • added menu for choosing controls
  • added more progress to the world, as you grow flowers, world grows
  • small improvements to targeting

v200 added:

  • new art assets
  • new animations
  • new sounds and music
  • better sphere implementation
  • gamepad controls

Future features to be added:

  • better border transitions
  • even more growth in the world
  • maybe an actual menu
  • replacement of audio, addition of new audio for new actions in game
  • communication from the world to the player
  • possibly multiple bg tracks to choose from
